squad.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a group of players from which a team will be chosen for a particular sports event
squad.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the police department responsible for dealing with a particular kind of crime
squad.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: A controlled explosion was carried out by bomb squad officers.
squad.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a small group of soldiers working together as a unit
